description.english: Unleash the 4th level of "Dead array" as DeadLiar
description.schinese: 将DeadLiar的"Dead array"蓄力到第四阶段释放
description.tchinese: 將DeadLiar的"Dead array"集氣到第四階段釋放
description.japanese: DeadLiarの"Dead array"四段階目を出した

description.english: Witness the secret of the Scarlet-Queen (Segment2L Boss)
description.schinese: 接触到Scarlet-Queen（Segment2L boss）的秘密
description.tchinese: 接觸到Scarlet-Queen（Segment2L boss）的秘密
description.japanese: Scarlet-Queen(Segment2L boss)の秘密と対面した

description.english: Hear the last words uttered by the Rusted-Dragon
description.schinese: 听到Rusted-Dragon（Segment4 boss）的遗言
description.tchinese: 聽到Rusted-Dragon（Segment4 boss）的遺言
description.japanese: Rusted-Dragon(Segment4 boss)の最後に残した言葉を聞いた

description.english: Reach the terminus of"Mausoleum"
description.schinese: 抵达"灵庙"的终点
description.tchinese: 抵達"靈廟"的終點
description.japanese: "霊廟"の終端まで到達した

description.english: Earn an "immortal" bonus (not including the Practice Chamber)
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中获得1次 "immortal" 奖励（"PRACTICE CHAMBER"模式除外）
description.tchinese: 在一場遊戲中獲得1次 "immortal" 獎勵（"PRACTICE CHAMBER"模式除外）
description.japanese: 1回のゲーム中に "immortal" ボーナスを1回獲得した("PRACTICE CHAMBER"を除く)

description.english: Earn 5 "immortal" bonuses in a single game run (not including the Practice Chamber)
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中获得5次 "immortal" 奖励（"PRACTICE CHAMBER"模式除外）
description.tchinese: 在一場遊戲中獲得5次 "immortal" 獎勵（"PRACTICE CHAMBER"模式除外）
description.japanese: 1回のゲーム中に "immortal" ボーナスを5回獲得した("PRACTICE CHAMBER"を除く)

description.english: Earn 10 "immortal" bonuses in a single game run (not including the Practice Chamber)
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中获得10次 "immortal" 奖励（"PRACTICE CHAMBER"模式除外）
description.tchinese: 在一場遊戲中獲得10次 "immortal" 獎勵（"PRACTICE CHAMBER"模式除外）
description.japanese: 1回のゲーム中に "immortal" ボーナスを10回獲得した("PRACTICE CHAMBER"を除く)

description.english: Achieve a Spirit "Breakthrough" (Not including the Practice Chamber)
description.schinese: 达成Spirit的"Breakthrough"（"PRACTICE CHAMBER"模式除外）
description.tchinese: 達成Spirit的"Breakthrough"（"PRACTICE CHAMBER"模式除外）
description.japanese: Spiritの"Breakthrough"を達成した("PRACTICE CHAMBER"を除く)

description.english: Achieve a Kill "Breakthrough" (Not including the Practice Chamber)
description.schinese: 达成Kill的"Breakthrough"（"PRACTICE CHAMBER"模式除外）
description.tchinese: 達成Kill的"Breakthrough"（"PRACTICE CHAMBER"模式除外）
description.japanese: Killの"Breakthrough"を達成した("PRACTICE CHAMBER"を除く)

description.english: Earn more than 25 spirit with a single "UNCHAIN" (requires upgraded Spirit gauge)
description.schinese: 单次"UNCHAIN"获得超过25点Spirit（需要Spirit高级显示）
description.tchinese: 單次"UNCHAIN"獲得超過25點Spirit（需要Spirit擴張顯示）
description.japanese: 25 Spirit以上を  一度の"UNCHAIN" で獲得した(要Spirit 拡張表示)

description.english: Earn more than 50 spirit with a single "UNCHAIN" (requires upgraded Spirit gauge)
description.schinese: 单次"UNCHAIN"获得超过50点Spirit（需要Spirit高级显示）
description.tchinese: 單次"UNCHAIN"獲得超過50點Spirit（需要Spirit擴張顯示）
description.japanese: 50 Spirit以上を  一度の"UNCHAIN" で獲得した(要Spirit 拡張表示)

description.english: Earn more than 75 Spirit with a single "UNCHAIN" (requires upgraded Spirit gauge)
description.schinese: 单次"UNCHAIN"获得超过75点Spirit（需要Spirit高级显示）
description.tchinese: 單次"UNCHAIN"獲得超過75點Spirit（需要Spirit擴張顯示）
description.japanese: 75 Spirit以上を 一度の"UNCHAIN" で獲得した(要Spirit 拡張表示)

description.english: Achieve both a Spirit and a Kill "Breakthrough" in a single game run.(not including the Practice Chamber)
description.schinese: 一局游戏内同时达成Spirit和Kill的"Breakthrough"（"PRACTICE CHAMBER"模式除外）
description.tchinese: 一場遊戲內同時達成Spirit和Kill的"Breakthrough"（"PRACTICE CHAMBER"模式除外）
description.japanese: 一回のゲーム中で、SpiritとKillの"Breakthrough"両方を達成した("PRACTICE CHAMBER"を除く)

description.english: Collect the maximum possible amount of crystals in "Mausoleum" (424)
description.schinese: 在“灵庙”内打出424个（极限值）可获取的结晶
description.tchinese: 在「靈廟」內打出424個（極限值）可獲取的結晶
description.japanese: ”霊廟”内で得られる結晶を424個（限界値）出現させた

description.english: Collect 100 Spirit with a single "FINELINE" bonus (requires upgraded spirit gauge)
description.schinese: 因"FINELINE"奖励一次性获得超过100点Spirit（需要Spirit高级显示）
description.tchinese: 以"FINELINE"獎勵而一次的獲得超過100點Spirit（需要Spirit擴張顯示）
description.japanese: "FINELINE"ボーナスで一度に100Spirit以上を獲得した(要Spirit 拡張表示)

description.english: Collect 200 Spirit with a single "FINELINE" bonus (requires upgraded spirit gauge)
description.schinese: 因"FINELINE"奖励一次性获得超过200点Spirit（需要Spirit高级显示）
description.tchinese: 以"FINELINE"獎勵而一次的獲得超過200點Spirit（需要Spirit擴張顯示）
description.japanese: "FINELINE"ボーナスで一度に200Spirit以上を獲得した(要Spirit 拡張表示)

description.english: Collect 400 Spirit with a single "FINELINE" bonus (requires upgraded spirit gauge)
description.schinese: 因"FINELINE"奖励一次性获得超过400点Spirit（需要Spirit高级显示）
description.tchinese: 以"FINELINE"獎勵而一次的獲得超過400點Spirit（需要Spirit擴張顯示）
description.japanese: "FINELINE"ボーナスで一度に400Spirit以上を獲得した(要Spirit 拡張表示)

description.english: Collect 800 Spirit with a single "FINELINE" bonus (requires upgraded spirit gauge)
description.schinese: 因"FINELINE"奖励一次性获得超过800点Spirit（需要Spirit高级显示）
description.tchinese: 以"FINELINE"獎勵而一次的獲得超過800點Spirit（需要Spirit擴張顯示）
description.japanese: "FINELINE"ボーナスで一度に800Spirit以上を獲得した(要Spirit 拡張表示)

description.english: Collect 60 Spirit with a single "NUTCRACK" bonus (requires upgraded spirit gauge)
description.schinese: 因"NUTCRACK"奖励一次性获得超过60点Spirit（需要Spirit高级显示）
description.tchinese: 以"NUTCRACK"獎勵而一次的獲得超過60點Spirit（需要Spirit擴張顯示）
description.japanese: "NUTCRACK"ボーナスで一度に60Spirit以上を獲得した(要Spirit 拡張表示)

description.english: Collect 120 Spirit with a single "NUTCRACK" bonus (requires upgraded spirit gauge)
description.schinese: 因"NUTCRACK"奖励一次性获得超过120点Spirit（需要Spirit高级显示）
description.tchinese: 以"NUTCRACK"獎勵而一次的獲得超過120點Spirit（需要Spirit擴張顯示）
description.japanese: "NUTCRACK"ボーナスで一度に120Spirit以上を獲得した(要Spirit 拡張表示)

description.english: Collect 180 Spirit with a single "NUTCRACK" bonus (requires upgraded spirit gauge)
description.schinese: 因"NUTCRACK"奖励一次性获得超过180点Spirit（需要Spirit高级显示）
description.tchinese: 以"NUTCRACK"獎勵而一次的獲得超過180點Spirit（需要Spirit擴張顯示）
description.japanese: "NUTCRACK"ボーナスで一度に180Spirit以上を獲得した(要Spirit 拡張表示)

description.english: Collect 240 Spirit with a single "NUTCRACK" bonus (requires upgraded spirit gauge)
description.schinese: 因"NUTCRACK"奖励一次性获得超过240点Spirit（需要Spirit高级显示）
description.tchinese: 以"NUTCRACK"獎勵而一次的獲得超過240點Spirit（需要Spirit擴張顯示）
description.japanese: "NUTCRACK"ボーナスで一度に240Spirit以上を獲得した(要Spirit 拡張表示)

description.english: Witness the final form of the Segment 5 boss
description.schinese: 见到Segment5 boss的最终形态
description.tchinese: 見識到Segment5 boss的最終形態
description.japanese: Segment5 boss の最終形態と対面した

description.english: Defeat the Segment 7 boss just as the MEMORY TRANSFER gauge is about to reach zero
description.schinese: 在"MEMORY TRANSFER"槽恰好为0（"JUST"）的时候击破Segment7 boss
description.tchinese: 在"MEMORY TRANSFER"計量器近乎為0（"JUST"）的時機擊破Segment7 boss
description.japanese: Segment7 boss を"MEMORY TRANSFER"ゲージが0に近い"JUST"のタイミングで撃破した

description.english: Unlock the SOUND MEMOIRS option on the Main Menu
description.schinese: 使主菜单出现"SOUND MEMOIRS"项
description.tchinese: 使主選單出現"SOUND MEMOIRS"項目
description.japanese: メインメニューに"SOUND MEMOIRS"を出現させた

description.english: Complete Segment 1L With the maximum level of STELLA (A)
description.schinese: 以STELLA等级最大（A）的状态打通Segment1L
description.tchinese: 以STELLA等級最大（A）的狀態破關Segment1L
description.japanese: Segment1LをSTELLAレベルが最大(A)の状態でクリアする

description.english: Complete the preliminary Practice Chamber
description.schinese: 完成初次启动时的"PRACTICE CHAMBER"
description.tchinese: 完成初次啓動時的"PRACTICE CHAMBER"
description.japanese: 初回起動時の"PRACTICE CHAMBER"を修了する

description.english: Complete all chapters of the comprehensive Practice Chamber
description.schinese: 将初次启动后的完全版"PRACTICE CHAMBER"从CHAPTER1打到结尾
description.tchinese: 將初次啓動後的完全版"PRACTICE CHAMBER"從CHAPTER1打到結束
description.japanese: 初回起動以後の完全版"PRACTICE CHAMBER"をCHAPTER1から最後まで修了する

description.english: "Extend" after losing a life
description.schinese: 中弹同时涨残
description.tchinese: 中彈同時加台
description.japanese: 被弾によってエクステンドする

description.english: Visit "Mausoleum" before two segments end in "FULL SEQUENCE ORDER"
description.schinese: "FULL SEQUENCE ORDER"模式中至迟在完成两个segment后进入"灵庙"
description.tchinese: "FULL SEQUENCE ORDER"模式中在完成兩個segment之前進入"靈廟"
description.japanese: "FULL SEQUENCE ORDER"で2つのsegment終了後までに"霊廟"へ行った

description.english: Earn 20 "immortal" bonuses in a  single game run (not including the Practice Chamber)
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中获得20次 "immortal" 奖励（"PRACTICE CHAMBER"模式除外）
description.tchinese: 在一場遊戲中獲得20次 "immortal" 獎勵（"PRACTICE CHAMBER"模式除外）
description.japanese: 1回のゲーム中に "immortal" ボーナスを20回獲得した("PRACTICE CHAMBER"を除く)

description.english: Lose 9 lives in a single segment without using any continues (not including "Mausoleum" or the Practice Chamber)
description.schinese: 单个segment中失去9次Life（"灵庙"及"PRACTICE CHAMBER"除外，且中间不续关）
description.tchinese: 單個segment中失去9次Life（"靈廟"及"PRACTICE CHAMBER"除外，且中間不接關）
description.japanese: 1segment中で9回ライフを失なった("霊廟"と"PRACTICE CHAMBER"を除く、コンティニューを挟まない)

description.english: Let the time run out with only one life left in the Segment 7 Boss fight
description.schinese: 在Life 1的状态下打Segment7 boss超时
description.tchinese: 在Life 1的狀態下打Segment7 boss到時限到
description.japanese: Segment7 bossでライフ1の状態で時間切れになった

description.english: Bring the TRANSPORTER all the way to the boss in Segment 1L
description.schinese: 带着TRANSPORTER一起见Segment1L的boss
description.tchinese: 帶著TRANSPORTER一起到達Segment1L的boss
description.japanese: Segment1LでbossまでTRANSPORTERを連れて行った

displayName.english: AN AWESOME PRAYER IS CONFLICT WITH US
displayName.schinese: AN AWESOME PRAYER IS CONFLICT WITH US
displayName.tchinese: AN AWESOME PRAYER IS CONFLICT WITH US
displayName.japanese: AN AWESOME PRAYER IS CONFLICT WITH US

description.english: Initiate a boss fight from the "SEGMENT LOCATION" menu (Press the discharge button)
description.schinese: 从"SEGMENT LOCATION"菜单开始boss战（按Discharge键）
description.tchinese: 從"SEGMENT LOCATION"選單開始boss戰（按Discharge按鈕）
description.japanese: "SEGMENT LOCATION"メニューからボス戦を開始する(ディスチャージボタンを押す)

description.english: Defeat Glorious-Symbol (Segment 2B boss)
description.schinese: 击破Glorious Symbol（Segment2B boss）
description.tchinese: 擊破Glorious Symbol（Segment2B boss）
description.japanese: Glorious-Symbol(Segment2B boss)を撃破した

description.english: Reach the last SECTOR of Segment 4
description.schinese: 抵达Segment4的最终Sector
description.tchinese: 抵達Segment4的最終Sector
description.japanese: Segment4の最終SECTORに到達した

description.english: Reach Segment 8
description.schinese: 抵达Segment8
description.tchinese: 抵達Segment8
description.japanese: Segment8に到達した

description.english: Earn 50 Spirit before leaving the CHAFF zone at the start of Segment 1L (LEVEL must be unplugged)
description.schinese: 穿过Segment1L开头的CHAFF地带时即达到50Spirit（LEVEL限制为unplugged）
description.tchinese: 在穿過Segment1L開頭的CHAFF地帶之前達到50Spirit（LEVEL限定為unplugged）
description.japanese: Segment1L冒頭のCHAFF地帯を抜けるまでに50Spiritを達成した(LEVELがunplugged限定)

description.english: Earn 65 Spirit before leaving the CHAFF zone at the start of Segment 1L (LEVEL must be unplugged)
description.schinese: 穿过Segment1L开头的CHAFF地带时即达到65Spirit（LEVEL限制为unplugged）
description.tchinese: 在穿過Segment1L開頭的CHAFF地帶之前達到65Spirit（LEVEL限定為unplugged）
description.japanese: Segment1L冒頭のCHAFF地帯を抜けるまでに65Spiritを達成した(LEVELがunplugged限定)

description.english: Earn 160 kills before leaving the CHAFF zone at the start of Segment 1L
description.schinese: 穿过Segment1L开头的CHAFF地带时即达到160Kill
description.tchinese: 在穿過Segment1L開頭的CHAFF地帶之前達到160Kill
description.japanese: Segment1L冒頭のCHAFF地帯を抜けるまでに160Killを達成した

description.english: Earn 200 kills before leaving the CHAFF zone at the start of Segment 1L
description.schinese: 穿过Segment1L开头的CHAFF地带时即达到200Kill
description.tchinese: 在穿過Segment1L開頭的CHAFF地帶之前達到200Kill
description.japanese: Segment1L冒頭のCHAFF地帯を抜けるまでに200Killを達成した

description.english: Clear Segment 3L after destroying both CLIONES (large Targets that exist on the right and left sides at the beginning and ends of each field)
description.schinese: 在Segment3L纯靠自己破坏掉两只CLIONE（画面左右两侧始终存在的大型的者）并通关
description.tchinese: 在Segment3L純靠自己破壞掉兩隻CLIONE（畫面左右兩側始終存在的大型的者）而破關
description.japanese: Segment3LをCLIONE(終始フィールド左右に存在する大型の的)を二体とも自力で破壊してクリアした

description.english: Destroy the Scarlet-Queen’s Thorned-Tiara (top middle part of Segment 2L boss)
description.schinese: 破坏掉Scarlet-Queen（Segment2L boss）的THORNED-TIARA（中央最上方的部件）
description.tchinese: 破壞掉Scarlet-Queen（Segment2L boss）的THORNED-TIARA（中央最上方的部位）
description.japanese: Scarlet-Queen(Segment2L boss)のTHORNED-TIARA(中央真上のパーツ)を破壊した

description.english: Start a segment in FULL SEQUENCE ORDER with 0-15 Terra, and finish the sequence without letting your Terra fall to 0 (while also not using any continues)
description.schinese: 在FULL SEQUENCE ORDER模式中以0~15的TERRA值开始一个Segment，并保持TERRA大于零打通该Segment（仅限未续关时）
description.tchinese: 在FULL SEQUENCE ORDER模式中以0～15的TERRA值開始一個Segment，並保持TERRA大於零而清除過關該Segment（僅限未接關時）
description.japanese: FULL SEQUENCE ORDER中にTERRA値0～15の状態でSegmentを開始し、そのSegmentをTERRAを0にせずクリアした（コンティニュー未使用時に限る）

description.english: Unlock "Mausoleum" after clearing Segment 7 in FULL SEQUENCE ORDER. (Cannot unlock it during the Segment)(Cannot have used continue)
description.schinese: 在FULL SEQUENCE ORDER模式中，在打通Segment7后才确定进入"灵庙"关（不可在Segment内确定，仅限未续关时）
description.tchinese: 在FULL SEQUENCE ORDER模式中，在清除過關Segment7後確定進入"靈廟"（不包含在Segment內確定，僅限未接關時）
description.japanese: FULL SEQUENCE ORDER中、Segment7のクリア後に"霊廟"の開放が確定した（Segment内で確定した場合は含めず、コンティニュー未使用時に限る）

description.english: Complete a segment in FULL SEQUENCE ORDER with only 1 life left (Cannot have used continue)
description.schinese: 在FULL SEQUENCE ORDER模式中，以1残机结束某个Segment（仅限未续关时）
description.tchinese: 在FULL SEQUENCE ORDER模式中，以殘機1狀態結束某個Segment（僅限未續關時）
description.japanese: FULL SEQUENCE ORDER中に残ライフ数1でSegmentを終えた（コンティニュー未使用時に限る）

description.english: After completing a segment in FULL SEQUENCE ORDER with only 1 life left, go on to complete the segment after it. (No skips or continues can be used)
description.schinese: 在FULL SEQUENCE ORDER模式中以1残机结束某个Segment后，打通下个Segment（不可跳过关卡，仅限未续关时）
description.tchinese: 在FULL SEQUENCE ORDER模式中以殘機1狀態結束某個Segment後，清除過關下個Segment（不包含跳過關卡的場合，僅限未接關時）
description.japanese: FULL SEQUENCE ORDER中に残ライフ数1でSegmentを終えた後、次のSegmentをクリアした（Segmentがスキップされた場合は含まず、コンティニュー未使用時に限る）

description.english: Collect 90 Spirit with a single
description.schinese: 单次"UNCHAIN"获得超过90点Spirit（需要Spirit高级显示）
description.tchinese: 單次"UNCHAIN"獲得超過90點Spirit（需要Spirit擴張顯示）
description.japanese: 90 Spirit以上を 一度の"UNCHAIN" で獲得した(要Spirit 拡張表示)

description.english: Start a segment in FULL SEQUENCE ORDER with only 0~15 TERRA. (cannot have used continue)
description.schinese: 在FULL SEQUENCE ORDER模式中以0~15的TERRA值开始一个Segment（仅限未续关时）
description.tchinese: 在FULL SEQUENCE ORDER模式中以0～15的TERRA值開始一個Segment（僅限未接關時）
description.japanese: FULL SEQUENCE ORDER中にTERRA値0～15の状態でSegmentを開始した（コンティニュー未使用時に限る）

description.english: Reach STELLA level ‘A’ before any UNCHAINable Targets appear in Segment 1L (Level must be unplugged)
description.schinese: Segment1L中在可以UNCHAIN的的者登场前，已使STELLA达到"A"（LEVEL限制为unplugged）
description.tchinese: Segment1L中在可以UNCHAIN的的者登場前，已使STELLA達到"A"（LEVEL限定為unplugged）
description.japanese: Segment1LでUNCHAIN可能な的が登場する前に、STELLAが"A"に達していた(LEVELがunplugged限定)

description.english: Destroy a total of 24 different parts from Segment 5 boss’s many different forms.
description.schinese: Segment5 boss的四个形态中，以击破全部部件（24个）的方式击退其中至少三个
description.tchinese: Segment5 boss的4個形態中，以擊破全部部位（24個）的方式擊退其中至少3個形態
description.japanese: Segment5 boss本体の4形態の内いずれかの3形態をパーツ全破壊(24個)により撃退した

description.english: Use Fossil Maiden’s Bacillus Clock (press and release the discharge button very quickly)
description.schinese: 使用Fossilmaiden的Bacillus Cloak（极快地短按Discharge键）
description.tchinese: 使用Fossilmaiden的Bacillus Cloak（極快地短按Discharge按鈕）
description.japanese: Fossilmaidenのバチルスクローク(ディスチャージボタンをごく短く押す)を使用した

description.english: Activate Fossil Maiden’s Curtain Riser (Hold down the discharge button until the attack self destructs when the time limit is reached)
description.schinese: 使用Fossilmaiden的Curtain Riser（长按Discharge键）时，直到自动爆开（到时间）为止都不松手。
description.tchinese: 使用Fossilmaiden的Curtain Riser（長按Discharge按鈕）時，直到自動爆開（視時間界限）為止都不鬆手。
description.japanese: Fossilmaidenのカーテンライザー(ディスチャージボタンを長く押す)使用時に、（時間の限界によって）自動的に炸裂するまでボタンを離さずにいた

description.english: As Minogame, Reach over 3000 DPS in the Practice Chamber with "MEASURING INSTRUMENT" set to "INTERVAL 10 seconds".
description.schinese: 使用Minogame，在"PRACTICE CHAMBER"的"MEASURING INSTRUMENT"模式内，以INTERVAL10设置获得3000以上的D.P.S.
description.tchinese: 使用Minogame，在"PRACTICE CHAMBER"的"MEASURING INSTRUMENT"模式內，以INTERVAL10設定而獲得3000以上的D.P.S.
description.japanese: Minogameを使い、"PRACTICE CHAMBER"内の"MEASURING INSTRUMENT"のINTERVAL10秒設定で3000以上のD.P.S.を出した

description.english: As DeadLiar, maintain a status of SOL:5 and LUNA: H,  and fire a prolonged steady stream of "Main Shot".
description.schinese: 使用DeadLiar，维持SOL:5/LUNA:H的状态，持续发出通常主射击一段时间。
description.tchinese: 使用DeadLiar，同時維持SOL:5/LUNA:H的狀態，某種程度的長時間，持續發出通常主射擊。
description.japanese: DeadLiarを使い、SOL:5/LUNA:H の両方を維持しつつ、通常メインショットをある程度長時間持続して撃ち続けた

description.english: Achieve a Spirit Breakthrough before completing 3 segments in FULL SEQUENCE ORDER
description.schinese: FULL SEQUENCE ORDER模式中在打通3个Segment之前完成Spirit的Breakthrough
description.tchinese: FULL SEQUENCE ORDER模式中在清除過關3個Segment之前達成Spirit的Breakthrough
description.japanese: "FULL SEQUENCE ORDER"で3つのsegment終了後までにSpiritのBreakthroughを達成した

description.english: Achieve a Spirit Breakthrough before completing 2 segments in FULL SEQUENCE ORDER
description.schinese: FULL SEQUENCE ORDER模式中在打通2个Segment之前完成Spirit的Breakthrough
description.tchinese: FULL SEQUENCE ORDER模式中在清除過關2個Segment之前達成Spirit的Breakthrough
description.japanese: "FULL SEQUENCE ORDER"で2つのsegment終了後までにSpiritのBreakthroughを達成した
